name: gaming-day-network-monitor
description: Epic Gaming Day Network Monitoring Dashboard with automated device discovery

scripts.snmp-test: python3 -c 'from snmp_scanner import SNMPScanner; s=SNMPScanner(); print("SNMP Test:", s.snmp_get("192.168.1.1", "1.3.6.1.2.1.1.5.0", "public"))'
scripts.build: echo 'No build step required - static HTML'
scripts.install-python-deps: pip3 install --break-system-packages python-nmap scapy pysnmp requests || pip3 install python-nmap scapy pysnmp requests

author: Gaming Day Team
